TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Point extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 代表在二維空間中的 X 和 Y 座標組。

span.span: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中、 之間的分隔符號和值可以是逗號或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the and values of a can be either a comma or a space. 做為十進位的分隔符號，而不是句號字元，某些文化特性可能會使用逗號字元。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. XAML 處理而異的文化特性為 EN-US，在大部分的 XAML 處理器實作中，預設值，並預期期限設為十進位的分隔符號。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 您應該避免使用逗號字元做為小數分隔符號，如果指定在 XAML 中，因為會將衝突的字串類型轉換屬性值到和元件。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into the and components. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業就相當於新增至。This operation is equivalent to adding a to a . 請注意，呼叫方法才會有作用，如果您可以變更和直接內容。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the and properties directly. 因為是實值類型，如果您參考物件使用屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果您嘗試變更或對屬性或索引子參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。If you attempt to change or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同樣地，呼叫屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果您想要變更的值參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新修改它的欄位，然後指派回屬性或索引子。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何位移和值結構。The following example shows how to offset the and values of a structure. [!code-csharp[PointExamples_snip#OffsetExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PointExamples_snip/CSharp/PointExample.cs#offsetexample_csharp)]
